text: 15.18-19 Apo 19.18, 2 Ko 3.5, 12.12 Pen yad ke gɨpin ak ma agɨnɨgayn. Klays yɨp dɨl kod mɨdaknɨŋ, nop chɨgɨl mɨdɨl kɨles ne ak dɨpin ak agɨnɨgayn. Kɨles ne ak dɨl, binɨb Juda mel okok kɨli God nop kɨdek gɨnɨgel agɨl, kɨlop takaw tep ak agñɨbin. Klays yɨp gek, takaw tep ne ak agɨlɨg wog gɨtep gɨlɨg gɨpin. Yɨp gek kɨles dɨl, tap mageptek keke ogɨnap gɨpin. Gen, God Kawnan ne ak yɨp kod mɨdaknɨŋ wog kɨles tɨmel gɨl gɨpin. Anɨgen, binɨb Juda mel okok nɨŋɨd, God nop kɨdek gɨpal. Ak nɨm, yad Jelusalem tɨkjakɨl, Klays takaw teplep ne ak agñɨ tep gɨ dam dam man palawl man Yililikum amjakɨnek. Anɨgɨl ajɨlɨg, Klays takaw teplep ne ak mɨdupsek agñɨjunek, binɨb man anɨb okok nɨgɨlak.
